div.p: Subject: Billy Tjakamarra; Pensioner Concession Card Number: 307111942H; gender = male; birthDate = 23/04/1954; indigenous status = Aboriginal but not Torres Strait Islander origin
Procedure reason: condition - Puncture wound from stepping on a rusty nail, sole of left foot
Procedure note: Dressing of puncture wound sole of left foot, caused by stepping on a rusty nail
Procedure note: Advised to present in 2 days to the usual GPs clinic for a change of dressings.
